Classes/TNTransformer.html.abstract: Inherit this class as to create your transformers.

Classes/TNRequest.html.name: TNRequest
Classes/TNRequest.html.abstract: The core class of TermiNetwork. It handles the request creation as well as the request execution.

Classes/TNCache.html.name: TNCache
Classes/TNCache.html.abstract: TNCache is used internally for various tasks such as in-memory caching image data.

Classes/TNConfiguration.html.name: TNConfiguration
Classes/TNConfiguration.html.abstract: A configuration class that can be used with TNEnvironment, TNRouteConfiguration and TNRequest.

Classes/TNEnvironment.html.name: TNEnvironment
Classes/TNEnvironment.html.abstract: The TNEnvironment contains information about host, port, configuration and it’s used in TNRequest instances.

Classes/TNOperation.html.name: TNOperation
Classes/TNOperation.html.abstract: This class is inherited by TNRequest to control the execution of the request.

Classes/TNQueue.html.name: TNQueue
Classes/TNQueue.html.abstract: Use this class to create custom queues.

Classes/TNRouteConfiguration.html.name: TNRouteConfiguration
Classes/TNRouteConfiguration.html.abstract: Route configuration class which is used in TNRoute protocol implementations.

Classes/TNRouter.html.name: TNRouter
Classes/TNRouter.html.abstract: This class is used to create instances of TNRouter that can be used to start requests based on the given Route.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
